cascade_quantities.map: function (doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'service' || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.quantities || doc.billing_id == doc._id) return;for (var key in doc.quantities) {var obj = doc.quantities[key];for (var prop in obj) {if (obj[prop] < 1) continue;for (var idx in doc.pvt_tree) {emit([doc.pvt_tree[idx] || doc._id, key, prop], obj[prop]);}}}}

reseller_quantities.map: function (doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'service' || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.quantities) return;for (var key in doc.quantities) {var obj = doc.quantities[key];for (var prop in obj) {if (obj[prop] < 1) continue; emit([doc.pvt_reseller_id, key, prop], obj[prop]);}}}
